content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner
inventory=[{"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 36, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a magenta banner I first need to craft some jungle planks, which requires me to place the jungle wood in the crafting grid. Therefore, I am going to move the jungle wood from slot 13 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 36, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the jungle planks, I will move them to my inventory (eg., slot 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner
inventory=[{"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 36, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a magenta_banner, I first need to craft a stick. A stick can be crafted from any plank. I have 1 dark_oak_plank at slot 42, so I will move that into the crafting grid to make a stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 36, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that the dark_oak_plank is in the crafting grid, I need to add another one to craft a stick. I have 3 more jungle_planks at slot 12, so I will move one of those into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 36, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that the stick has been crafted, I need to move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 13) before I can use it to craft the banner.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1
